page.title: 20WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: There are Women's Institutes in the villages.Women from the survey area are mentioned.The movement was formed in Great Britain in 1915.Its purpose is to improve the quality of the life of country-women and to help them develope their own skills and talents. Monthly meetings are held in village halls,at which Institute business, interesting talks and demonstrations on many subjects take place.Members sell produce from their kitchens,gard- ens,and farms,so helping the older mem -bers and Institute friends.This may be the only opportunity when some mem- bers can get together and talk.In an area like this the Women's Institute performs an important social function. Survey by members of Gt.&Lt. Sampford Women's Institute & friends. Computer work-Anna Lee,White House Farm.Little Sampford-Schoolgirl,age14.
